# MKAnnotationView.DragState.canceling

**Case**

An annotation view cancels drag operation.

## Declaration

```swift
case canceling
```

## Discussion

A user action causes the view to cancel the drag operation. You can put an annotation view into this state to abort the operation.

## Constants

- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.none**: An annotation view that doesn’t have a drag operation.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.starting**: An annotation view begins dragging.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.dragging**: An annotation view is actively dragging.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.ending**: An annotation view ends dragging.
